page.title: 12Survey of Hauxton
page.content: We interviewed a number of people living around the Hauxton area, people with jobs such as the church warden and the village postman. Most of them used bikes or cars as transport. Most of them also enjoyed sports, including cricket, swimming and jogging. They bought their food from Great Shelford, Newmarket and Cambridge. They all travelled to Cambridge for larger items such as clothes or furniture. A number of them wanted better facilities for their sporting activities, and also the wish for their village to be kept clean and tidy.
